english.segment1: Your love keeps liftin' me higher. Than I've ever been lifted before. So keep it up, yeah, quench my desire. And I'll be at your side forevermore. Yeah
english.segment2: You know your love (your love keeps liftin' me). It keeps on liftin' (your love keeps liftin' me). Higher (liftin' me, higher and higher). Yeah, yeah your love (your love keeps liftin' me). It keeps on liftin' (your love keeps liftin' me). Higher (Liftin' me higher and higher)
english.segment3: Now, once I was downhearted. Disappointment was my closest friend. But then you came and he soon departed. And you know he never showed his face again
english.segment4: I'm so glad I finally found you. Yes, that one, the one in a million, yeah. And I wish my lovin' arms around you. Cause I can stand up and face the world
english.segment5: Come on, lift me up (your love keeps liftin' me). Yeah
